did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Republican National Committee campaign director records, 1960-1965.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of Albert Bartholomew Hermann, campaign director, including correspondence, memoranda, and other papers relating to internal operations of the administrative staff, and to campaign plans, finances, itineraries; also research materials, workshop training materials, campaign literature, transcipts, press releases, and photographs.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files of Albert Bartholomew Hermann, campaign director, including correspondence, memoranda, and other papers relating to internal operations of the administrative staff, and to campaign plans, finances, itineraries; also research materials, workshop training materials, campaign literature, transcipts, press releases, and photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to the permission of the office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Republican National Committee campaign director records, #2420. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
